hfbasin.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
hfbasin.comment: Contains contributions from all physical processes affecting the northward heat transport, including resolved advection, parameterized advection, lateral diffusion, etc. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.   Use Celsius for temperature scale.

hfbasinpadv.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
hfbasinpadv.comment: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized eddy-induced advective transport due to any subgrid advective process. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.
hfbasinpadv.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection

hfbasinpmadv.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
hfbasinpmadv.comment: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized mesoscale eddy-induced advective transport. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.
hfbasinpmadv.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection

hfbasinpmdiff.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
hfbasinpmdiff.comment: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized mesoscale eddy-induced diffusive transport (i.e., neutral diffusion). Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.
hfbasinpmdiff.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Diffusion

hfbasinpsmadv.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
hfbasinpsmadv.comment: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized mesoscale eddy-induced advective transport. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.
hfbasinpsmadv.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection

htovgyre.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
htovgyre.comment: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.
htovgyre.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Gyre

htovovrt.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
htovovrt.comment: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.
htovovrt.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Overturning

msftmrho.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
msftmrho.comment: Overturning mass streamfunction arising from all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

msftmrhompa.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
msftmrhompa.comment: CMIP5 called this 'due to Bolus Advection'.  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.
msftmrhompa.long_name: Ocean Meridional Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection

msftmz.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
msftmz.comment: Overturning mass streamfunction arising from all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

msftmzmpa.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
msftmzmpa.comment: CMIP5 called this 'due to Bolus Advection'.  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.
msftmzmpa.long_name: Ocean Meridional Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection

msftmzsmpa.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
msftmzsmpa.comment: Report only if there is a submesoscale eddy parameterization.
msftmzsmpa.long_name: Ocean Meridional Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection

msftyzsmpa.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
msftyzsmpa.comment: Report only if there is a submesoscale eddy parameterization.
msftyzsmpa.long_name: Ocean Y Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection

sltbasin.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean

sltovgyre.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
sltovgyre.comment: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.
sltovgyre.long_name: Northward Ocean Salt Transport Due to Gyre

sltovovrt.cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
sltovovrt.comment: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.
sltovovrt.long_name: Northward Ocean Salt Transport Due to Overturning
